item.title: Common Questions around VCDX-NV
item.author: Author
item.description: When I was starting my journey to achieve the VCDX-NV certification, I had a lot of questions. Now as a panelist in training and an occasional helper for VCDX workshops, I’ve noticed that many candidates have the same questions as the ones I’ve had when I was a candidate. So I decided it might be useful if I help answer some of those questions in a blogpost. Here we go!
